poultry-type.title: What type of poultry will be housed in this building?

current-system.title: What type of hen housing system do you currently use in the building?

current-multi-tier-system.title: Does your current building include a multi-tier aviary systems?

ramp-connection.title: Will every level of the multi-tier system be connected to another level by a ramp?

maximum-tier-height.title: Will the highest tier with direct access to the floor be 2 metres high or less?

tier-number.title: How many tiers will be positioned directly above each other in the {{_poultryType_}} system?

hen-multi-tier.title: Will the hens in your grant-funded building be reared in a multi-tier system as pullets?

pullet-multi-tier.title: Will the pullets in your grant-funded building be reared in a multi-tier system as pullets?

natural-light.title: Will the building have windows that provide natural light to the indoor housing?

dark-brooders.title: Will the housing include dark brooders?

easy-grip-perches.title: Will the perches have a design feature that help the hens grip the perches?

building-biosecurity.title: Will the building structure include the following?

answers.building-biosecurity-A1: Shower facilities in the biosecurity changing area
answers.building-biosecurity-A2: An integrated externally accessible storage room with a separate air space

pollution-mitigation.title: Will the building have any of the following?

answers.pollution-mitigation-A3: Air filtration at outlets, for example using wet or dry scrubbers
answers.pollution-mitigation-A4: A tree shelter belt near air outlets

pullet-veranda-features.title: Will the pullet housing have a veranda with these features?

renewable-energy.title: Will the hen housing use renewable energy sources?

bird-data-type.title: What poultry management data will you automatically collect and store?

environmental-data-type.title: What additional environmental data will you automatically collect and store?
